description: This juicy summer peach sandwich stuffed with rich and flavorful Thai peanut sauce, fresh basil, and grilled up to crispy, delicious perfection.
name: Grilled Peach Sandwich with Basil & Thai Peanut Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk peanut sauce ingredients together in small bowl. Thin with a bit of water if desired, keeping in mind that it will soften up when grilled.
Slather bread slices with peanut sauce, then stuff with peach slices and basil leaves.

Coat a medium flat-bottomed skillet with oil and place over medium heat. Place sandwich into skillet and cook until browned on bottom, about 3-4 minutes. Flip and cook until browned on opposite side, 3-4 minutes.
